00005 CHTQSABIDDLMTracer::CHTQSABIDDLMTracer()

00009 QString CHTQSABIDDLMTracer::name() const
00010 {
00011     return QString("HTQSABIDDLM");
00012 }
00013 
00014 bool CHTQSABIDDLMTracer::checkSSS( const STreeNode *node,
00015                                  int depth, int qsDepth ) const
00016 {
00017     if( node->s_childList.count() == 0 )
00018         return true;
00019     
00020     if( depth == 0 )
00021     {
00022         if( (!node->s_quiescent) || qsDepth == 0 )
00023             return true;
00024         qsDepth--;
00025     }
00026     else
00027         depth--;
00028     
00029     if( node->s_childList.count() == 1 )
00030         return checkSSS( node->s_childList.first(), depth, qsDepth );
00031     
00032     return false;
00033 }
00034 
00035 void CHTQSABIDDLMTracer::generateHistoryTable( const STreeNode *node ) const
00036 {
00037     m_historyTable.insert( node, node->s_history );
00038     
00039     const STreeNode *i;
00040     foreach( i, node->s_childList )
00041         generateHistoryTable( i );
00042 }
00043 
00044 QString CHTQSABIDDLMTracer::moveName( const STreeNode *node ) const
00045 {
00046     if( node == NULL )
00047         return QString();
00048     if( node->s_parent == NULL )
00049         return QString();
00050     
00051     QString n = node->s_name;
00052     QString p = node->s_parent->s_name;
00053     
00054     if( n.count() > 1 || p.count() > 1 )
00055         return QString( "%1-%2" ).arg(p).arg(n);
00056     return QString( "%1%2" ).arg(p).arg(n);
00057 }
00058 
00059 void CHTQSABIDDLMTracer::sortNodes( QList<STreeNode *> &nodes) const
00060 {
00061     int nodeCount = nodes.count();
00062     int i, j, h1, h2;
00063     for( i = 0; i < nodeCount-1; ++i )
00064     {
00065         for( j = 0; j < nodeCount-1-i; ++j )
00066         {
00067             h1 = m_historyTable[nodes.at(j)];
00068             h2 = m_historyTable[nodes.at(j+1)];
00069             if( h2 > h1 )
00070                 nodes.swap(j,j+1);
00071         }
00072     }
00073             
00074 }
00075 
00076 QStringList CHTQSABIDDLMTracer::sssHistoryUpdates( const STreeNode *node,
00077                                            int depth, int qsDepth,
00078                                            bool top ) const
00079 {
00080     QStringList ret;
00081     if( !top )
00082     {
00083         m_historyTable[node]++;
00084         ret += moveName( node )
00085              + ':' + QString::number( m_historyTable[node] );
00086     }
00087     if( node->s_childList.count() == 0 )
00088         return ret;
00089     
00090     if( depth == 0 )
00091     {
00092         if( (!node->s_quiescent) || qsDepth == 0 )
00093             return ret;
00094         qsDepth--;
00095     }
00096     else
00097         depth--;
00098     
00099     return sssHistoryUpdates( node->s_childList.first(),depth,qsDepth,false )
00100            + ret;
00101 }

00103 float CHTQSABIDDLMTracer::sssValue( const STreeNode *node,
00104                                   int depth, int qsDepth ) const
00105 {
00106     if( node->s_childList.count() == 0 )
00107         return node->s_value;
00108     
00109     if( depth == 0 )
00110     {
00111         if( (!node->s_quiescent) || qsDepth == 0 )
00112             return node->s_value;
00113         qsDepth--;
00114     }
00115     else
00116         depth--;
00117     
00118     return sssValue( node->s_childList.first(), depth, qsDepth );
00119 }
00120 
00121 STreeTrace * CHTQSABIDDLMTracer::trace( const STreeNode *rootNode,
00122                                   int depth, int qsDepth ) const
00123 {
00124     STreeTrace *newTrace = new STreeTrace;
00125     newTrace->s_aiName = name();
00126     newTrace->s_columnNames = 
00127         QString("call|open|eval|value|a,B|best action,value").split('|');
00128     
00129     if( rootNode == NULL )
00130         return newTrace;
00131     if( rootNode->s_childList.isEmpty() )
00132         return newTrace;
00133     
00134     m_historyTable.clear();
00135     generateHistoryTable( rootNode );
00136     
00137     int d;
00138     STreeCall *curDepth;
00139     for( d = 1; d <= depth; ++d )
00140     {
00141         curDepth = new STreeCall;
00142         traceCall( curDepth, rootNode, d, qsDepth, -INF, INF, true );
00143         
00144         ((SHTQSABIDDLMLine*)(*curDepth)[0])->s_call = 
00145                                         QString("DLM(%1,%2,%3,-INF,INF)")
00146                                         .arg(rootNode->s_name)
00147                                         .arg(d)
00148                                         .arg(qsDepth);
00149         ((SHTQSABIDDLMLine*)(curDepth->s_lines.last()))->s_boxAction = true;
00150         ((SHTQSABIDDLMLine*)(curDepth->s_lines.last()))->s_boxValue = false;
00151         
00152         newTrace->s_depths.append( curDepth );
00153     }
00154     
00155     return newTrace;
00156 }
00157 
00158 void CHTQSABIDDLMTracer::traceCall( STreeCall *call, const STreeNode *node,
00159                                   int depth, int qsDepth,
00160                                   float alpha, float beta, bool max ) const
00161 {
00162     if( call == NULL || node == NULL )
00163         return;
00164 
00165     QList<STreeNode*> curChildren = node->s_childList;
00166     sortNodes( curChildren );
00167 
00168     QString open;
00169     STreeNode *curNode;
00170     foreach( curNode, curChildren )
00171         open += curNode->s_name
00172               + QString::number(m_historyTable[curNode]) + " ";
00173     open = open.simplified();
00174     
00175     SHTQSABIDDLMLine *curLine;
00176     STreeNode *bestAction = NULL;
00177     float bestValue = -1;
00178     int curDepth, curQSDepth;
00179     float curAlpha = alpha, curBeta = beta;
00180     bool better;
00181     bool isEndPoint;
00182     foreach( curNode, curChildren )
00183     {
00184         curDepth = depth;
00185         curQSDepth = qsDepth;
00186         curLine = new SHTQSABIDDLMLine;
00187         
00188         curLine->s_open = open;
00189         curLine->s_open.remove(' ');
00190         curLine->s_eval = curNode->s_name;
00191         open = open.section( ' ', 1, -1 );
00192         
00193         if( curDepth > 0 )
00194             curDepth--;
00195         else
00196             curQSDepth--;
00197         
00198         isEndPoint = false;
00199         if( (curNode->s_childList.count() == 0)
00200           ||(curDepth == 0 && (!curNode->s_quiescent || curQSDepth == 0)) )
00201             isEndPoint = true;
00202         
00203         curLine->s_valueCall = max?"Min":"Max";
00204         curLine->s_valueCall += QString("V(%1,%2,%3,%4,%5)")
00205                                 .arg(curNode->s_name)
00206                                 .arg(curDepth)
00207                                 .arg(curQSDepth)
00208                                 .arg(SHTQSABIDDLMLine::numberToString(curAlpha))
00209                                 .arg(SHTQSABIDDLMLine::numberToString(curBeta));
00210         if( isEndPoint )
00211         {
00212             curLine->s_valueValue = curNode->s_value;
00213             curLine->s_sss = false;
00214         }
00215         else if( checkSSS( curNode, curDepth, curQSDepth ) )
00216         {
00217             curLine->s_valueValue = sssValue( curNode, curDepth, curQSDepth );
00218             curLine->s_sss = true;
00219             curLine->s_historyUpdates = sssHistoryUpdates( curNode,
00220                                                     curDepth, curQSDepth );
00221         }
00222         else
00223         {
00224             call->s_children.append( new STreeCall() );
00225             traceCall( call->s_children.last(), curNode,
00226                        curDepth, curQSDepth,
00227                        curAlpha, curBeta, !max );
00228             curLine->s_valueValue = call->s_children.last()->s_returnValue;
00229         }
00230         curLine->s_qs = (curDepth == 0 && curQSDepth > 0
00231                          && curNode->s_quiescent);
00232 
00233         if( bestAction == NULL )
00234             better = true;
00235         else
00236         {
00237             if( max )   better = (curLine->s_valueValue > bestValue );
00238             else        better = (curLine->s_valueValue < bestValue );
00239         }
00240         if( better )
00241         {
00242             bestAction = curNode;
00243             bestValue = curLine->s_valueValue;
00244             
00245             if( max )
00246             {
00247                 if( bestValue >= curBeta )
00248                     curLine->s_prune = true;
00249                 else if( bestValue > curAlpha )
00250                     curAlpha = bestValue;
00251             }
00252             else
00253             {
00254                 if( bestValue <= curAlpha )
00255                     curLine->s_prune = true;
00256                 else if( bestValue < curBeta )
00257                     curBeta = bestValue;
00258             }
00259         }
00260         
00261         curLine->s_alpha = curAlpha;
00262         curLine->s_beta = curBeta;
00263         
00264         curLine->s_bestAction = node->s_name + bestAction->s_name;
00265         curLine->s_bestValue = bestValue;
00266         
00267         call->s_lines.append( curLine );
00268         
00269         if( curLine->s_prune )
00270             break;
00271         
00272         if( curLine->s_sss )
00273         {
00274             if( curLine->s_valueValue <= curLine->s_alpha )
00275                 curLine->s_prune = true;
00276             else if( curLine->s_valueValue >= curLine->s_beta )
00277                 curLine->s_prune = true;
00278         }
00279     }
00280     
00281     m_historyTable[bestAction]++;
00282     ((SHTQSABIDDLMLine*)call->s_lines.last())->s_historyUpdates
00283         += moveName( bestAction )
00284          + ':' + QString::number( m_historyTable[bestAction] );
00285     
00286     call->s_returnValue = bestValue;
00287     ((SHTQSABIDDLMLine*)call->s_lines.first())->s_call = 
00288         QString(max?"MaxV(%1,%2,%3,%4,%5)":"MinV(%1,%2,%3,%4,%5)")
00289         .arg(node->s_name)
00290         .arg(depth)
00291         .arg(qsDepth)
00292         .arg(SHTQSABIDDLMLine::numberToString(alpha))
00293         .arg(SHTQSABIDDLMLine::numberToString(beta));
00294     ((SHTQSABIDDLMLine*)call->s_lines.last())->s_boxValue = true;
00295 }

00297 SHTQSABIDDLMLine::SHTQSABIDDLMLine()
00298 {
00299     s_call = QString();
00300     s_open = QString();
00301     s_eval = QString();
00302     
00303     s_valueCall = QString();
00304     s_valueValue = 0.0;
00305     s_qs = false;
00306     s_sss = false;
00307     s_prune = false;
00308     
00309     s_alpha = -INF;
00310     s_beta = INF;
00311     
00312     s_bestAction = QString();
00313     s_boxAction = false;
00314     s_bestValue = 0.0;
00315     s_boxValue = false;
00316 }

00318 SHTQSABIDDLMLine::~SHTQSABIDDLMLine()
00319 {
00320 }

00322 QString SHTQSABIDDLMLine::numberToString( float val )
00323 {
00324     if( val == INF )
00325         return QString("INF");
00326     if( val == -INF )
00327         return QString("-INF");
00328     return QString::number(val);
00329 }
00330 
00331 QString SHTQSABIDDLMLine::operator [](int index)
00332 {
00333     QString ret;
00334     
00335     switch( index )
00336     {
00337     case 0: //  CALL
00338         ret = s_call;
00339         break;        
00340     case 1: //  OPEN
00341         ret = s_open;
00342         break;   
00343     case 2: //  EVAL
00344         ret = s_eval;
00345         break;   
00346     case 3: //  VALUE
00347         ret = s_valueCall;
00348         ret += "=" + QString::number( s_valueValue );
00349         if( s_qs || s_sss || s_prune )
00350         {
00351             ret += " (";
00352             if( s_qs )
00353             {
00354                 ret += "QS";
00355                 if( s_sss || s_prune )
00356                     ret += ",";
00357             }
00358             if( s_sss )
00359             {
00360                 ret += "SSS";
00361                 if( s_prune )
00362                     ret += ",";
00363             }
00364             if( s_prune )
00365                 ret += "prune";
00366             ret += ")";
00367         }
00368         break;
00369     case 4: //  a,b
00370         ret += numberToString(s_alpha);
00371         ret += ", ";
00372         ret += numberToString(s_beta);
00373         break;
00374     case 5: //  BEST ACTION,VALUE
00375         if( s_boxAction )
00376             ret = QString("[%1], ").arg(s_bestAction);
00377         else
00378             ret = s_bestAction + ", ";
00379         if( s_boxValue )
00380             ret += QString("[%1]").arg(s_bestValue);
00381         else
00382             ret += QString::number(s_bestValue);
00383         
00384         if( !s_historyUpdates.isEmpty() )
00385             ret += QString(" {%1}").arg(s_historyUpdates.join(","));
00386         break;   
00387     default:
00388         break;
00389     }
00390     
00391     return ret;
00392 }

00394 QStringList SHTQSABIDDLMLine::toStringList()
00395 {
00396     QStringList ret;
00397     
00398     for( int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00399         ret += (*this)[i];
00400     
00401     return ret;
00402 }
